query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZTBEVAFF1 ( MANDT ,YYM ,TYP ,SNO ,LST ,PJT ,NAM ,TPE ,SPC ,QTY ,CKY ,AMT ,LAB_C ,OPCK ,BUDGET ,DSC ,CHAKD ,COMP2 ,CRD ) SELECT #G_MANDT# AS MANDT , TO_CHAR( CURRENT_DATE , 'YYYYMM') AS YYM , '13' AS TYP , (SELECT COALESCE( MAX(SNO) , 0 ) FROM SAPHEE.ZTBEVADF1 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND YYM = TO_CHAR( CURRENT_DATE , 'YYYYMM') AND TYP = '13' WITH UR ) AS SNO , B.PMTM_SEQN AS LST , A.PSPID AS PJT , B.PYMT_CLSS AS NAM , '' AS TPE , B.PAYT_TIMI AS SPC , B.PAYT_RATE AS QTY , 'KRW' AS CKY , B.PAMT AS AMT , 0 AS LAB_C , '' AS OPCK , 0 AS BUDGET , B.NOTE AS DSC , '00000000' AS CHAKD , '00000000' AS COMP2 , '00000000' AS CRD FROM SAPHEE.ZFST0403 A JOIN SAPHEE.ZFST0404 B ON ( A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CONT_NUMB = B.CONT_NUMB AND A.CONT_NTIM = B.CONT_NTIM ) WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PROV_SEQN = #PROV_SEQN# WITH UR
